description: I’ve collected painted ponies for 10 years! Each one is hand crafted and one of a kind, not to mention each purchase that I have made has contributed to non profit organizations.

I remember when this card game was introduced in 2006, I would go and buy all of the cards that I could. My brother and I would look for the tell tale markings on the packaging that would promise a rare card.
Anime has always been a huge part of my life. I’ve collected figures, artwork, DVD’s and even made my own manga’s. Check out my page I have all kinds of awesome finds!
